The Official MooMoo Informative Survey

This survey will provide RBW Entertainment a broader perspective of how MooMoos (fans of the KPop girl group MAMAMOO) view their current management of MAMAMOO and highlight areas of improvement. Please refrain from writing inappropriate, defamatory responses towards MAMAMOO as those will incur legal action from RBW Entertainment.
